public class zeta.content.zirp.Predicate

(source file: Predicate.pizza)

The pure class interface. 
public class Predicate
  extends AnnotatedTerm
The abstract syntax of Z predicates.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: Predicate.pizza,v 1.1.1.1 1998/09/01 10:51:17 wg Exp $

Binary(BinaryKind, Predicate, Predicate)
Binary operators
Fact(FactKind)
Facts
Quantor(QuantorKind, Expr, Predicate)
Quantors
Schema(Expr)
Applying a schema as a predicate (`schema reference')
Test(Expr, Expr)
Element Test
Unary(UnaryKind, Predicate)
Unary operators

BinaryKind
Kind of binaries.
ConstrRef
Reference of a time or step constraint.
FactKind
Kinds of facts.
QuantorKind
Quantor kinds.
UnaryKind
Kind of unary operators.

Schema
public case Schema(Expr schema);
Applying a schema as a predicate (`schema reference').

Parameters:
schema - expression which denotes a schema, that is a set of bindings.

Test

public case Test(Expr elem,
                 Expr set);
Element Test. Also represents relations: R(e1,...,en) == Test((e1,...,en),R).

Parameters:
elem - expression denoting the element to test
set - expression denoting the set to test

Fact

public case Fact(FactKind kind);
Facts.

Parameters:
kind - the kind of the fact.

Unary

public case Unary(UnaryKind kind,
                  Predicate oper);
Unary operators.

Parameters:
kind - the kind of the unary operator, logical negation and a lot of DZ specific operators.
oper - the predicate to which the operation is applied to.

Binary

public case Binary(BinaryKind kind,
                   Predicate left,
                   Predicate right);
Binary operators.

Parameters:
kind - the kind of the binary operator (the usual logical connectivities and DZ specific operators).
left - the left operand predicate.
right - the right operand predicate.

Quantor

public case Quantor(QuantorKind kind,
                    Expr matrix,
                    Predicate range);
Quantors.

Parameters:
kind - the kind of the quantor.
matrix - the matrix of the quantor, an expression denoting a schema.
range - the range of the quantor, a predicate.

  extends Term

  extends Term

public static class ConstrRef
  extends Term

  extends Term

  extends Term
